page.title: 12LIFESTYLES
page.content: Many people in Govan are{unemployed} and are living on Social Security. {Lifestyles}of people in Govan have not changed for generations. Men usually congragate in pubs and have interests in pool, darts and other sports. Women usually go to bingo, or, they meet and talk while doing everyday tasks like shopping or hanging out washed clothing. Quite a lot of the children in the area deliver newspapers which helps them make extra money on top of their pocket money. The children mostly meet their friends at school. Out of school there are discos and clubs for them to attend all year round. The highlight of their year is the summer holidays which gives them days of freetime and sometimes 2 weeks away.
